original_body_lines: Interesting, indeed – singer Justin Bieber is a dog lover and that’s because he bonded with his dad at an animal shelter for stray cats and dogs when he was a child.According to Bieber, they moved to a city where he didn’t know anybody, so…”I wanted a friend around and Sam was that friend who we took from an animal shelter.”
Bieber wants his fans to go out to an animal shelter, or a place where you can get a dog who has been abandoned, or don’t have a home.I certainly do endorse what Justin Bieber has to say.
